name: BuddyPress Restrict Email Domains
author: rich fuller - rich! @ etiviti

sections.description:
** IMPORTANT **

This plugin will not be updated for future versions of BuddyPress (1.3) – if you would like to take over this plugin, please contact me.
http://twitter.com/#!/etiviti/statuses/29550143485247489

This plugin enables restriction of email domains during user registration for a single (non-multisite) WordPress installation of BuddyPress

This plugin will NOT work for a multisite/network WordPress install – intended for single WordPress ONLY.

Related Links:

  • Plugin About Page
  • Author’s BuddyPress Demo Site

Extra Configuration
sections.installation:
1. Upload the full directory into your wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin at the plugin administration page
  3. Enter email domains under WP-Admin -> BuddyPress -> Restrict Email
sections.faq:
I use Multisite WordPress – how can I enable Banned Email Domains for BuddyPress?

Please see this quick tip to add a simple filter:
http://etivite.com/groups/buddypress/forum/topic/quick-tip-added-banned-email-domain-check-to-multisite-buddypress-registration/#topic

My question isn’t answered here

Please contact me on

  • Plugin About Page
  • Twitter
